title: Trump’s Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy Once Defended Congress’ Power of the Purse. Now He Defies It.
description: As a congressman, Duffy made an impassioned legal case against executive overreach. A decade later, judges have used those same arguments to rebuke him for withholding billions in transportation funding.
content: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy has been one of the most vociferous defenders of President Donald Trumps expansive use of executive authority, withholding billions of dollars in federal funding t… [+7107 chars]
